description: This restaurant boasts an outdoor terrace overlooking one of the most beautiful squares in Verona, plus an equally attractive 19C-style room for indoor dining. It serves a selection of typical local and Italian dishes, with an emphasis on grilled main courses and a careful selection of high-quality meat.
